item.description:
Let's rally our Meetup troops to show Dr. Paul a warm and supportive welcome at the GOP BBQ and show all those attending that Ron Paul deserves their attention.


An hour prior to the GOP BBQ, we will meet to line Route 111 (West Hollis St.) with Ron Paul supporters holding campaign signs and Revolution Banners. Route 111 (at Exit 5 off Rt. 3, Everett Turnpike), leads to the GOP event.


We will announce the exact meet-up location prior to the event.


Bring signs if you have them, but don't worry if you don't have signs or banners. The Nashua Ron Paul Meetup Group will supply 35, 3 x 9 foot banners that we've made for this purpose. We have more events planned with these banners, so be sure to return them after the event
item.name: Pre-Hillsborough BBQ-Banner Blitz and Sign Wave
